review: Easy to download apps, remote is very responsive, always connected, it's a great product.
author: Timothy McKeown

review: Live TV, such as Sling or MLB is about impossible to watch. Continuous buffer, also have the Roku stick and that works just fine. Switched the two around to see if location made a difference, but it didn't matter. Fire stick 10 feet from router with nothing else running doesn't help.  Netflix is fine...
author: kevin Swartos

review: At first it worked really well (a few feet away from the modem and wifi) but now it barely connects (upstairs in a house). I hardly ever use it now and feel like it was a complete and total waste of money. I thought maybe it was my connection because I was upstairs but when I use my iPad or phone to try and watch Netflix or hulu from the same room where my firestick is, they work perfectly but the fire stick doesn't.
author: Maddy Anderson

review: Fantastic! Easy set-up and a must have if you are a prime member. Being able to mirror my HDX 7 on my big screen is unbelievably useful and the portability is also a huge plus. Overall I am extremely happy that I made this purchase and would recommend to all other primers out there.
author: T Padasak

review: My Fire stick seems to hang every once in awhile, but this could be the internet connection.  I love all of the option and the availability of services the fire stick has. I can practically anything I want whenever I want... great product!  They were out of stock when I first ordered and almost cancelled...glad I didn't!
author: Shawn D.Taylor

review: We had a little trouble at first but that smoothed out.  Great to watch movies, photo slide show and music.  I had some trouble getting music but Amazon (Help) fixed that for me.  Thanks so much.
author: Arlene Kaurin

review: I received this little jewel to put on the TV so my kids would quit using my tablet to watch Amazon Prime.  I had it set up in less than 15 minutes and I think this included watching the tutorial.  Kids are already watching a movie.  I will probably buy another one to go on the other TV since it is a pain to go through the Wii.  Thanks Amazon.
author: Michelle

review: What a great device, thought I would have to sell my old TV, Sony Bravia, which i have had for 20 years, was pleasantly suprised....highly reccomend, user friendly
author: Karen Mistovich

review: This thing is a complete buzz kill. I was really anticipating D day, was actually excited. Then it comes, I use it to watch shows on Hulu, Netflix, Amazon Instant Video... ect, and what I'm watching freezes up more than a dusty VCR tape. I know my internet speed isn't the problem because it clocks at an average of 80 MBPS and none of my other devices have this issue (not even the Chrome Cast I almost threw away). Realllllllly disappointed.
author: Teejay008
